name: Powers
text:
§560:4-205    A domiciliary foreign personal representative who has complied with section 560:4-204 may exercise as to assets in this State all powers of a local personal representative and may maintain actions and proceedings in this State subject to any conditions imposed upon nonresident parties generally. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
 
Rules of Court
 
  Notice, see HPR rule 79.
  Signing documents, see HPR rule 80.
